title: tyz
author: tyz
content: Hi,I am looking for someone who can do a simple job. The job is to go through the pages of a website and save their contents locally. All you need to have is a web browser.I will pay $0.05 per page in crypto. Visiting and saving a page should not take more than 10 seconds, depending on how fast your internet connection is. I prefer to pay in Litecoin.PM me if you are interested.If someone comes up with the idea of writing a bot to automatically save the pages, then unfortunately I have to disappoint them. The website uses a web application firewall that blocks automatic bots after a few visits.

comments.author: slatter57
comments.body: HelloI can do the job, please let me know how many pages you want to retrieve send me PM for information

comments.author: tyz
comments.body: Quote from: slatter57 on November 01, 2023, 10:43:17 PMHelloI can do the job, please let me know how many pages you want to retrieve send me PM for informationPm'ed you but no response.Still looking for someone!

comments.author: flowstay1
comments.body: Hello Sir! Is this still available? I'm willing to work on it sir

comments.author: limmurk
comments.body: HeyI've sent dm, but you haven't replied.
